entities.name: barty crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch is described as an elderly man with a stiff and upright posture, dressed in an impeccably crisp suit and tie. He has short gray hair with an almost unnaturally straight parting and a narrow toothbrush mustache that looks like it was trimmed using a slide rule. His shoes are very highly polished.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is described as sprawled on the grass in his old Wasp robes, contrasting with Barty Crouch who is dressed in a suit and tie.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as idolizing Barty Crouch because he believes in rigidly following rules.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being able to see why Percy idolizes Barty Crouch and also as doubting that Uncle Vernon would have spotted Barty Crouch for what he really was.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as someone who might not be able to spot Barty Crouch for what he really was.
